The review and inspection is required to obtain a building permit, or a use
Assembly occupancy — 8 cents per square foot;
Educational occupancy — 10 cents per square foot;
Health care occupancy — 10 cents per square foot;
Detention or correctional occupancy — 10 cents per square foot;
Residential occupancy — 8 cents per square foot;
Mercantile occupancy — 8 cents per square foot;
Business occupancy — 8 cents per square foot;
Industrial occupancy — 6 cents per square foot;
Storage occupancy — 6 cents per square foot;
$100 per plan review or use and occupancy inspection, whichever is greater;
Flammable or combustible liquid storage tank — 1 cent per gallon of maximum
Marina or pier — $120 plus $1.50 per slip; and
Outside storage of flammable and combustible materials such as scrap tire,
